701173f.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Burnside Avenue (East)
701173f.text:
2055 Grand Concourse (right), at the N.W. corner of East Burnside Ave., showing the Harding Court prior to completion. The view shows
the Burnside Ave. side of the building.
About 1923.
701173f.folder: Grand Concourse & Burnside Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700871f-a.title: Bronx: Burnside Avenue (Eas - Grand Concourse
700871f-a.text:
East Burnside Avenue, south side, west from Grand Concourse to Creston Avenue, showing the small park area built by the W.P.A. The two apartment houses in the background are on Creston Avenue.

May 10, 1937

W.P.A. Photo
Five Borough Project
700871f-a.folder: Burnside Avenue (Eas & Grand Concourse, Bronx, NY
